participant_1.background:
I am grateful for my health and my ability to enjoy the outdoors.
i have problems chewing my food.
i work as a veterinarian.
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I make it a point to keep in touch with my family, even though my schedule can be hectic at times.

participant_2.background:
I love music and I like to keep my files organized.
i am a mother of 2 daughters.
my favorite place to spend time at is the beach.
I don't have time for Comic Con because I spend my weekends outdoors with my dog.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.

content.text: What do you like to do in your spare time?
I love music and I like to keep my files organized.
I'm a big fan of music too! Who are your favorite artists?
I love a lot of different types of music, but I'm really into the indie scene right now.
Oh cool, I love discovering new music. Do you have any recommendations?
Yes, I just found this new band called The Japanese House and I'm really digging their sound.
I'll have to check them out!
What do you like to do with your daughters?
We love to go to the beach and play in the sand. We also love to go to the park and play on the swings.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm glad you have such a good relationship with your daughters.
Thanks, me too. I'm really lucky.
What do you like to do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I also work part-time as a waitress at a local restaurant.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of work!
It is, but it's worth it. I love spending time with my daughters and I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that! You seem like a really great person.
